document_data.name: Jeordros
document_data.mainbody: '''Jeordros''' was one of the three leaders of the [[Azatl]] settlement in [[Nexal]] in [[1362 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Jeordros ruled over the largest territory. In his territory's restricted areas, [[human]]s were instantly sent to the slave market.
document_data.Personality: Jeordros dreamed of one day challenging [[Hoxitl]]. He was fanatical about clearing out the ruins in the hopes of gaining control of the sacred square of Azatl.
